CustomField.description: Name of the Role for the Contact Role that should be summed for checking/validating. Use "ANY" to count all Roles, use "IsPrimary" to ensure there is a Primary Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name of the Role for the Contact Role that should be summed for checking/validating. Use "ANY" to count all Roles, use "IsPrimary" to ensure there is a Primary Contact.
CustomField.label: then count this Role
